subject: Hockey, Ice
Deaths (Obituaries)
Movies
lead_paragraph: Mr. Gund loved hockey, buying several teams, and he loved film, nurturing directors like Francis Ford Coppola and supporting film festivals around the world, including Sundance.
snippet: Mr. Gund loved hockey, buying several teams, and he loved film, nurturing directors like Francis Ford Coppola and supporting film festivals around the world, including Sundance.
